Description: Current declination (ICRS, at equinox)

name: currentPosition

Description: Current parallactic angle (ICRS, at equinox)

name: currentPosition
Description: Current Azimuth

name: currentPosition
Description: Current Elevation

name: currentPosition
Description: Current Zenith Angle

name: currentPosition
Description: Current Hour Angle

name: currentPosition
Description: Air Mass (TBD whether plane-parallel, i.e., sec(z), or curvature-corrected)

name: currentPosition
Description: Current focus (with 10 micrometer precision)

name: currentPosition
Description: Telescope F-ratio (TBD: this is a static quantity)

name: currentPosition
Description: Local Sidereal Time

name: currentPosition
Description: Timestamp for the data

name: pointingStatus
Description: Current state of the pointing system

name: M3 Position
Description: Current position in rotation.

name: M2 Position
Description: Current position in tip.

name: imgAtmDispersion
Description: The reference wavelength is the wavelength at which the computed dispersion is reported by the TCS as 0. Range is TBC.

name: instrumentRotatorAngle
Description: Current rotator angle in the XY plane of the FCRSIRIS.

name: pupilRotation
Description: Future IRIS pupil rotation angle in the X,Y plane of the FCRSIRIS-ROT that will be valid at the time indicated by "timestamp" attribute.

name: positionAngle
Description: Current angle between Y axis of FCRSIRIS and Declination axis (ICRS).

name: oiwfsProbeDemands
Description: 2-element array holding x,y values in the FCRSIRIS-ROT.

name: odgwPosDemands
Description: 2-element array holding x,y values in the FCRSIRIS-ROT.

name: CurrentPosition
Description: This is the Current Base Position.

name: CurrentPosition
Description: This is the Current Cap Position

name: current
Description: Current altitude estimated based on measured range distance and the value set for zenith angle (= current.rangeDistance*cos(simTcs.zenithAngle)).

name: state
Description: magnitude estimate of the variable intensity NGS sources in R band (TBC), based on manual and motorized attenuator (current.attenuation).

name: turbLgs
Description: fried parameter (r0)

name: turbNgs
Description: ground layer turbulence (p)

name: mode
Description: high-order loop rate. In LGS mode this is equal to the LGS WFS frame rate. In NGS or SL mode this is equal to the PWFS frame rate.

name: odgwImage
Description: ellipticity value based on the averaged spot ellipticity profile, i.e., ratio between σ1 and σ2 of the ellipse.

name: odgwImage
Description: image size 1 (σ1) based on the averaged spot ellipticity profile,

name: odgwImage
Description: image size 2 (σ2) based on the averaged spot ellipticity profile

name: odgwImage
Description: image rotation angle between the unrotated elliptical coordinate system and the local detector coordinate system

name: state
Description: Current ISM selection.

name: temperature
Description: Current temperature of DM0

name: sodiumLayer
Description: Current zenith angle used to calculate range distance from altitude.

name: temperature
Description: Air temperature inside the optical enclosure as reported by the refrigeration controller and the 1-Wire Sensor.

name: current
Description: Current position in X axis.

name: MIRROR_state
Description: whetehr the mirror is inserted into the light path or not

name: state
Description: Current imager filter name. When two or more filters are inserted in the science light path, filter names are concatinated with TBD character in the order of wheel number.

name: wheel1
Description: Current position name of this wheel.

name: ifsMode

name: sciAdcFollow
Description: indicates if science adc is currently following

name: ifsObserveSettings
Description: Number of configured ramps. Each ramp is bounded by resets and is of integration time in length. Each ramp has the sampling mode applied. The resultant raw Science Frame is created by adding the output of each ramp.

name: imagerObserveSettings
Description: Number of configured ramps. Each ramp is bounded by resets and is of integration time in length. Each ramp has the sampling mode applied. The resultant raw Science Frame is created by adding the output of each ramp.
